MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Bridge of Dee. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:02pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a bird strike on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:59pm on Monday, 8th March 2021.
